p: The soil under canopy in SHFA location attained the highest values of N, EC, and Mg, while the outside canopy soil showed the highest values of Ca and Na. On the other hand, the soil samples collected outside canopy of N. glauca attained the highest content of K and clay, while it attained the lowest N, EC, and Cl ( Table 3). Generally, the soil under canopy of N. glauca attained high nutrients and moisture than outside canopy.
